Grade: 60

Comment: The student provided a well-written explanation of Islamic beliefs regarding seeking forgiveness and atonement, but the response did not address the Christian perspective on the significance of the atonement lid in the context of the Ark of the Covenant. In a Christian worldview, the atonement lid symbolizes the covering of sins through the sacrificial blood sprinkled by the high priest, pointing towards the ultimate atonement provided by Jesus Christ through His sacrificial death on the cross. The response would have been stronger if it had incorporated the Christian understanding of atonement and forgiveness through Christ.
